Articles.Content:
For some strange reason, True Volumetric Clouds runs worse than Astronomer's Visual Pack (I used both with Parallax). 

Dropping the quality of the temporal anti-aliasing and the textures mitigated the problem a little bit, but it still has an impact on my gameplay.

I don't have any extra cloud mods running in the background. Only True Volumetric Clouds and EVE + Scatterer.

 

https://imgur.com/a/SPKuKSW

Edited Wednesday at 01:42 AM by david9000
